titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 800) to provide for education flexibility partnerships.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-102, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 800 with 1 hour of general debate. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 40.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 143.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/20/1999--Introduced. Waives points of order against consideration of the conference report to accompany H.R. 800 (education flexibility partnerships).
